Edited February 27, 2015 by Tom Robin

One from my Kerbal fan arts done by markers and colored pencils

Somewhere in the forum in Valentina contest, was already a discussion about long hair, they are uncomfortable for sure. But I don't mind, and I think astronauts can live with long hair. Especially the boys with long hair are very handsome.

I do not really have anything to do with my free time (yeah, of course ... XD) maybe some of you would be interested of the traditional picture from me, associated with Kerbals? The picture would be on the small size - 64 mm Ãƒâ€” 89 mm. So-called ACEO. Markers and crayons drawn, and sent to you by post. Of course totally for free. It would be great fun for me bacause I love drawing Kerbals and will be great practice to me too with drawing them.

You can send me message here or write to me at [email protected]

Have a nice day.

Here are my small-sized (64 x 89 mm) KSP cards made by markers and coloured pencils. Sorry for badly quality of photos, in real they looks better. If anyone wants one of them (yes I can send you this, for free!), or have a special request to do something like this - fell free to send priv message to me. I'd love to draw Kerbals for you ^^
Still WIP: A drawing of Inigma's Space Shuttle.
I decided Jhonen Vasquez' art style and KSP would match pretty well.

No RCS? No problem! We can still dock to the capsule!

This isn't fan art; this is the results of the docking: bonus points if you know the reference

P.S. I ate all the snacks.

P.S.S. This is my first post.

Dear KSP ladies, today is our Day! So be happy today every of you! You're always awesome :3

And dear boys, make a momentary break in the game for yours wives, girlfriends, daughters, sisters, mothers and other ladies! Make them special today!

Great stuff as always, Kyasarinn. I wish I could draw Kerbals that well!

haha that moustache!
@Tw1 will Oceans of Eve be continued? That picture reminded me.

@Tw1 will Oceans of Eve be continued? That picture reminded me.

It will, that picture was drawn while Evepod was driving around today. But the next part won't be very soon, as the rest of my week will have me occupied with uni.

I have 20 art drawings that are uploading now.

I worked hard this time After 1.0 u pdated my Teddy's design, now he is 100% badass

<-- I totally fell in love with him XD

Jumping from his falling and burning plane. Wooh.

And I also designet two characters. One is for my friend Kerbonaut aka Thomas988

and second one is the special request from DAKerbalSpaceProgram group on DeviantART. Founder asked me to create official group Kerbal. I'm so honored. Here she is

Hope to do more Kerbal fan works c: I just love creating Kerbals Orginal Characters
